lead_paragraph: Christine Lagarde, the head of the International Monetary Fund, warned in a speech that “the recovery remains too slow, too fragile.”

headline.print_headline: Down Day on Wall St. and Across the Globe
headline.main: Wall Street Lower After I.M.F. Chief’s Comments

snippet: Christine Lagarde, the head of the International Monetary Fund, warned in a speech that “the recovery remains too slow, too fragile.”
abstract: Stocks in United States sink for second day as International Monetary Fund head Christine Lagarde warns of slow economic growth for world economy.
